content.hook_text: I just built a full-stack app in 4 hours
content.title: Speed Run Dev

voiceover.text: I just built a full-stack app in four hours. Here's exactly how I did it.

visuals.action: looking excited at laptop screen, code visible

content.title: The Problem
content.body_text: I needed a tool that didn't exist, so I built it myself

voiceover.text: So I've been frustrated with existing solutions for project management. Everything was either too complex or missing key features. So I decided to build exactly what I needed.

code.snippet:
npx create-next-app@latest my-app
cd my-app
npm install prisma @prisma/client

voiceover.text: First, I spun up a Next.js project. Added Prisma for the database. This gives us a solid foundation with React, server components, and a type-safe ORM out of the box.
The core feature is this task creation function. It's dead simple - just takes a title and creates a task with pending status. But the magic is in how it integrates with the UI.

content.title: The Result
content.body_text: A fully working app in 4 hours

voiceover.text: And here's the final result. A clean, fast project management app that does exactly what I need. Drag and drop tasks, keyboard shortcuts, and it syncs across all my devices.

visuals.action: presenting finished app on screen proudly
